misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Kurk Golf and is set to make his 12th appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Known for his strategic play and unwavering determination, Marcus has become a respected figure among his peers.

Beyond the golf course, Marcus is known for his introspective nature. His journey of self-discovery has led him to explore his gender identity, and on occasion, he has been known to participate in golf events under the guise of his female alter-ego, Eva. This exploration has enriched his perspective, adding a layer of depth to his character that resonates with those around him.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Marcus remains a formidable competitor. His commitment to the sport and his continued pursuit of excellence make him one to watch in the upcoming tournament.
